Set or get options for my package

pkg_options.Rd

Set or get options for my package

pkg_options(...)

Arguments

...

Option names to retrieve option values or [key]=[value] pairs to set options.

Supported options

The following options are supported

  • ggplot_family(character;"Lato Light") Font family to use for ggplot2 graphs

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Supported options
